00031 #define TAB "\t"

00049 /*
00050  * Save the intervals to a BED file.
00051  */
00052 bool BEDFileWriter::Write()
00053 {
00054         // Return if no intervals
00055         if (intervalGroups.size() == 0)
00056                 return true;
00057 
00058         // Create the output file.
00059         ofstream outstr(fileName.c_str(), ios::out);
00060         if (!outstr)
00061                 return false;
00062 
00063         // Determine the start and stop position in the first sequence.
00064         int start=0;
00065         int stop=0;
00066         string seq;
00067         bool bFirst=true;
00068         IntervalEntryListConstIt iter;
00069         IntervalGroupListIt groupIt;
00070         for (groupIt=intervalGroups.begin(); groupIt!=intervalGroups.end(); ++groupIt)
00071         {
00072                 IntervalGroup &group = *groupIt;
00073                 for (iter=group.intervals.begin(); iter!=group.intervals.end(); ++iter)
00074                 {
00075                         const IntervalEntry &interval = *iter;
00076                         if (bFirst)
00077                         {
00078                         bFirst = false;
00079                         seq = interval.seq;
00080                         start = interval.start;
00081                         }
00082 
00083                         if (interval.seq != seq)
00084                         break;
00085 
00086                         stop = interval.stop;
00087                 }
00088         }
00089         FormatBrowser(seq.c_str(), start, stop);
00090         if (track.length() == 0)
00091         {
00092                 track = TRACK_LINE_START;
00093                 track += DEFAULT_TRACK_NAME;
00094         }
00095 
00096         // Write the header line
00097         outstr << browser << endl;
00098         outstr << track << endl;
00099 
00100         // Save the intervals
00101         for (groupIt=intervalGroups.begin(); groupIt!=intervalGroups.end(); ++groupIt)
00102         {
00103                 IntervalGroup &group = *groupIt;
00104                 TagValuePairTypeList::iterator paramIt;
00105                 for (paramIt=group.parameters.begin(); paramIt!=group.parameters.end(); ++paramIt)
00106                 {
00107                         outstr << "#" << (*paramIt).Tag << TAB << (*paramIt).Value << endl;
00108                 }
00109                 for (iter=group.intervals.begin(); iter!=group.intervals.end(); ++iter)
00110                 {
00111                         const IntervalEntry &interval = *iter;
00112                         outstr << interval.seq << "\t" << interval.start << "\t" << interval.stop;
00113                         if (interval.probeSetName.length() > 0)
00114                         {
00115                                 outstr << "\t" << interval.probeSetName << "\t" << interval.overlap << "\t" << interval.strand;
00116                         }
00117                         outstr << endl;
00118                 }
00119         }
00120 
00121         // Check the status
00122         if (outstr.fail() != 0)
00123                 return false;
00124 
00125         return true;
00126 }
